mapper.sql:
temp_carrier_car_information.car_id as temp_carrier_car_information_car_id, temp_carrier_car_information.carrier_member_id as temp_carrier_car_information_carrier_member_id, temp_carrier_car_information.route_name as temp_carrier_car_information_route_name, temp_carrier_car_information.transport_type as temp_carrier_car_information_transport_type, temp_carrier_car_information.service_type as temp_carrier_car_information_service_type, temp_carrier_car_information.plate_number as temp_carrier_car_information_plate_number, temp_carrier_car_information.car_age as temp_carrier_car_information_car_age, temp_carrier_car_information.car_type as temp_carrier_car_information_car_type, temp_carrier_car_information.car_length as temp_carrier_car_information_car_length, temp_carrier_car_information.car_load as temp_carrier_car_information_car_load, temp_carrier_car_information.car_attribution as temp_carrier_car_information_car_attribution, temp_carrier_car_information.car_status as temp_carrier_car_information_car_status, temp_carrier_car_information.transport_status as temp_carrier_car_information_transport_status, temp_carrier_car_information.audit_state as temp_carrier_car_information_audit_state, temp_carrier_car_information.audit as temp_carrier_car_information_audit, temp_carrier_car_information.audit_opinion as temp_carrier_car_information_audit_opinion, temp_carrier_car_information.audit_time as temp_carrier_car_information_audit_time, temp_carrier_car_information.remark as temp_carrier_car_information_remark, temp_carrier_car_information.creater as temp_carrier_car_information_creater, temp_carrier_car_information.create_time as temp_carrier_car_information_create_time, temp_carrier_car_information.updater as temp_carrier_car_information_updater, temp_carrier_car_information.update_time as temp_carrier_car_information_update_time
,temp_creater.user_cn_name as temp_carrier_car_information_creater_display ,temp_updater.user_cn_name as temp_carrier_car_information_updater_display ,temp_audit.user_cn_name as temp_carrier_car_information_auditor_display ,temp_carrier_member.member_name as temp_carrier_car_information_carrier_member_real_name ,temp_car.cartype_name as temp_carrier_car_information_car_type_display

LEFT JOIN t_user temp_creater ON temp_creater.user_id = temp_carrier_car_information.creater LEFT JOIN t_user temp_updater ON temp_updater.user_id = temp_carrier_car_information.updater LEFT JOIN t_user temp_audit ON temp_audit.user_id = temp_carrier_car_information.audit LEFT JOIN t_carrier_member temp_carrier_member ON temp_carrier_member.carrier_member_id = temp_carrier_car_information.carrier_member_id LEFT JOIN t_parameter_carrier_car_type temp_car ON temp_car.cartype_id = temp_carrier_car_information.car_type
mapper.select:
select
,
from t_carrier_car_information temp_carrier_car_information
where temp_carrier_car_information.car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
